tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is my 1st visit to Dr.Mohan & Dr. Pramod for tooth extraction. As an individual I had a lot of anxiety, apprehensions etc about the process, treatment, recovery etc.
I must say with 100 % assurance that the overall experience was excellent.  Both Uncle Dr .Mohan and Dr.Pramod explained the situation very well, most importantly made me feel extremely relaxed and completed the procedure as per planned timelines.
This is a place I would highly recommend!  5/5 to me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Very Nice Doctor, Very Bice treatment, Very Nice Clinic, Very Nice equipments, Very Nice Ambience also

I visited the dentist with tooth discomfort and received a quick diagnosis of a wisdom tooth that needed extraction. The procedure took less than 10 minutes the next day, and I was given clear instructions for post-extraction care. Despite my initial apprehension, I experienced no pain throughout the process or afterwards* *** ******** ********** efficient procedure, and effective medication made the experience much better than expected. I'll definitely return for future concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Good clarity in explaining the problem and the pros and cons. Further left his brief and dwelt into the importance and care a child needs to give to dental care to have a better adulthood from dental point of view.
At time I thought am I interacting with a Dental Dr or a Professor who is addressing his students. 

In a nutshell was a pleasant and pleasurable experience.

review: Dr K A Mohan was professor and head of the department in government dental college Bengaluru. He was principal of dental college. So he has both teaching and practical experience which has helped him in treating patients to their satisfaction. Moreover his medical ethics is commendable.

review: Doctor Mohan is very skilled at his field and has the knack to keep the patient at easy while doing the treatment.  I highly recommend doctor Mohan and the services offered by De Care dental center.

I thank the doctors Dr.mohan and his son dr.pramod and the other doctor who did the procedure.... They are so humble, so professional and very very friendly, they make us feel so comfortable and relaxed.. Charged very very nominally.... Very senior doctors yet so humble....i have no words to express my gratitude to all of them.!

Went for root canal. Most experienced doctor. **** *** ********* *********** *********** Explains each and every step. Did it in one seating without any pain. Very clean environment and takes care of Covid19 protocol strictly. Prices are very reasonable. I am very happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got my wisdom teeth removed by Dr. Mohan. Previously both my sons got their teeth aligned by him which gave great results. I am a very nervous person but he guided me well and made me feel comfortable. He made it feel like home. He is quite strong for his age and effortlessly pulled out the teeth and guides us as always on how to care after procedures. He gives us knowledge on various other things related to life.
